programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a special edition of the iconic game show as Olympic silver medallist Katarina Johnson-Thompson goes up against the infamous Banker - supported on the wings by her friends, family and fellow athletes, can Katarina choose the right boxes and resist the Bankers tempting cash offers until just the right moment in order to take home a fortune for her chosen charity?

programme.sub-title: The Price Is Right: Christmas Special

programme.desc: Theres truly life-changing money on offer as Ant and Dec try to help more contestants climb as high up the never-ending money ladder as they can - first up is Terri, who wants to take her sons to Disney, and her best friend Jess who wants to travel the world. Its then husband and wife Paul and Ellies turn to take on the Limitless Ladder - they play the game competitively when watching at home, but now they try to translate that into a huge win in the studio.

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: Epic dramatisation of T E Lawrences life and his efforts to unite the Arabs against the Turkish Empire in World War I. Lawrences complex personality is explored against a backdrop of stunning desert scenery and riveting action.

programme.title: Fame Kills

programme.title: The Life and Death of Tupac Shakur

programme.desc: A group of men leave a job site late one night and one of them is drawn in by a bright light and quickly disappears; based on the movie, `Fire in the Sky.

programme.desc: Chilling documentary charting a brutal real life tale of kidnapping, enslavement and murder. Find out how investigators tracked down a malicious murderer and explore the extensive trial that followed.

programme.desc: When a quiet bachelor lets a mysterious woman into his life, the results are disastrous for both him and his family.

programme.desc: Documentary exploring the 1997 Loomis-Fargo armoured car heist in North Carolina and the serio-comic fates of its underdog perpetrators. who fell victim to avarice, mutual betrayals and false romantic promises.

programme.title: Escape From Death Row
programme.desc: How did six murderers hatch an elaborate plan to escape from the first death row prison, thought to be escape-proof?

programme.title: Dying Out Loud
programme.desc: Female prisoners explain how they got to be facing life without parole, even though theyre innocent.

programme.title: Yellowstone Journals
programme.desc: Winter is by far the longest season of Yellowstone as well as its cruelest. Only the toughest and cleverest survive the cold, starvation and competition.

programme.title: Otters: River Masters of Yellowstone
programme.desc: Follows two families of river otters in Yellowstone and how they join together to face challenges.

programme.title: In the Land of the Moose
programme.desc: At the end of the summer, a moose finds herself alone in the forest. She has just lost her calf, probably to a bear. Now she must find a mate. Once pregnant again, she will endure months of bone-chilling winter until she delivers in the spring.

programme.title: Golden Eagles: Witnesses to a Changing West
programme.desc: Eagles in Wyoming face climate change, sprawl, lead, energy threats; rehab and tribal ties aid them.

programme.title: Yellowstone Journals
programme.desc: Winter slowly releases its cold grasp on Yellowstone, but spring is slow to arrive. The sun melts the snow and ice, waking the park and its residents from a deep winter slumber. With the thaw comes water, and with water comes an abundance of food.

programme.title: Yellowstone Journals
programme.desc: The warmth of spring brings new life and energy to Yellowstone. Bears come out of hiding. Babies of all shapes and sizes explore their incredible new world. Every resident is eager to enjoy this magical time full of promise.

programme.title: Big Cats of the Serengeti
programme.desc: Cameras reveal the last secrets of Africas largest wild lions by following two prides.

programme.title: Lions: Africas Super Power
programme.desc: The endless plains of East Africa is a paradise for lions. The most social of all cats, lions form prides that are unlike any other animals. Together, theyll hunt, raise their young and defend their territory.

programme.title: Cheetah: Beating the Odds
programme.desc: A cheetah raises her young family on the vast expanse of the Serengeti, facing enormous challenges. Lions are quick to throw their muscle around, and hyenas and jackals attempt to steal anything the cheetah manages to kill.

programme.title: Megeti - Africas Lost Wolf
programme.desc: The story of the Ethiopian she-wolf Megeti, who lost her pack and is suddenly completely on her own. Since it is essential for the survival of the young wolf to rejoin a pack, she wanders through the Ethiopian highlands in search of a new home.

programme.title: Baboon Bandits
programme.desc: A close look at the Table Mountain baboons and the local reactions they incite.

programme.title: Hoanib - The Secrets of The Desert Elephants
programme.desc: The Namib is one of the most hostile deserts, but some animals have developed ways to survive.

programme.title: Chandani: The Daughter of the Elephant Whisperer
programme.desc: Chandani has a burning desire to follow in her fathers footsteps and become a mahout. A Mahout takes care about elephants.

programme.title: Giants of Fortune
programme.desc: On the Filipino island of Cebu, the ravages of typhoons and over-fishing have made livelihoods scarce for islanders. It seems bleak for Zosimo and his family until the worlds biggest fish, the whale shark, changes everything.

programme.title: Life in the Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: From majestic lions and soaring peregrines to mysterious manta rays and gentle manatees, explore a world brimming with extraordinary species.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Resident clock expert Steven Fletcher and ceramics conservator Kirsten Ramsay toil on a fragile 19th-century clock. Several of the porcelain details were broken off when the clock took a tumble several years ago but with Steves mind for mechanisms and Kirstens eye for detail, the pair soon have it looking and sounding as good as new.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Furniture restorer William Kirk takes on a cherished family rocking horse that is in desperate need of some TLC. The paint work and plaster is flaking away and the leather work is tattered and torn, but saddler maker Suzie Fletcher is on hand. Together they do a beautiful job and return the rocking horse to the delight of the family.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Damaged treasures are brought back to life by some of the countrys best craftspeople.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Ceramics conservator Kirsten Ramsay takes on a very rare Royal Doulton figurine of a First World War soldier, once owned by the last master pottery thrower of the Doulton factory. Now the pride and joy of his grandson, the soldier has been through the wars, a fall several years ago knocked off his head.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Ceramic conservator Kirsten Ramsay carefully restores a cherished but chipped piece of 1960s pottery, but with pieces missing and a highly polished finish to mimic, Kirsten has her work cut out. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The eponymous commando is coaxed out of retirement to act as a guide to a group of aid workers on a humanitarian mission in Burma. However, when the Burmese army captures the group, he mounts a violent one-man rescue mission to try to save the missionaries.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The eponymous commando is coaxed out of retirement to act as a guide to a group of aid workers on a humanitarian mission in Burma. However, when the Burmese army captures the group, he mounts a violent one-man rescue mission to try to save the missionaries.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley. (2024, 90 mins)

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The days leading up to the tragedy of President John F. Kennedys assassination and its immediate aftermath are chronicled as they were experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Sweethearts
programme.desc: Two college freshmen make a pact to break up with their high school sweethearts over Thanksgiving break, leading them on a chaotic night out in their hometown that puts their codependent friendship to the test.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.desc: When Mary Lennoxs parents suddenly die, she is sent to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie and a living woman sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.

programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Survivors of a global plague are besieged in Las Vegas. The Umbrella Corporation wants Alice for her DNA. If the scientists dont get her, the zombies will.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. Using his codename Condor, he contacts the CIA, but when an agent tries to kill him, he kidnaps a stranger off the street to ensure his survival and attempts to turn the tables on those who want him dead.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: A troubled female cop must unravel the perfect murder as she matches wits with two homicidal schoolboys, who believe they cant be caught after committing a motiveless crime. As she gets ever closer to the truth she at once alienates her new partner and puts her own life in peril.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Another great white shark arrives to terrorise the holiday resort of Amity Island. Having recovered from the grisly events of four years ago, the island is once again packed with tourists. Families are sailing in the bay and swimming off the beach, but when two divers and a water-skier go missing, the local police chief fears that he is about to relive his greatest nightmare.

programme.title: Jaws III
programme.desc: Second sequel to Steven Spielbergs 1970s blockbuster transports the action from Amity Island to a new undersea kingdom attraction in a Florida theme park. The capture of a baby great white shark is big news and brings crowds to the park - until its mother arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A mild mannered, socially weird government accountant moonlights as a highly trained, and deadly assassin.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: Agatha, Roy, and Sarah attend the Fruit Preserve Festival, where Charles and James are two of the judges for the jam competition, and DCI Wilkes is one of the competitors. DCI Wilkes employs Agatha to find the killer, as hes currently in the frame.

programme.title: Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: The stage is all set for the wedding of the year between James and his Welsh fiancee, Eirwen, but nothing ever goes to plan in Carsely. programme.title: Agatha Raisin

programme.desc: While en route to Ferenginar, Jake and Nog are attacked by the JemHadar and rescued by an elite group of Starfleet cadets on a secret mission.

The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Journey to the harsh Okavango Delta as the Matata Pride do battle with wildfires and flooding in a high-stakes fight to keep their cubs alive.

programme.title: Predators

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Capuchin Louis makes the most out of being let outside for the first time - playing a game of hide and sneak with Donna. Slow loris Bruce gets botox.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison receives footage of a pet Tamarin monkey in need of a home, Bruce the loris gets a check-up and golden-cheeked gibbons Kim and Tien get cosy.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimp Gypsy is very unwell, Dodger the capuchin meets some new ladies and chimp Bart has eyes for just one thing.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A health check for newly rescued tamarin Red raises alarm, newcomer capuchin Matty squares up to dominant male Erico and the chimps get a tasty treat.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Using the latest audio technology, David Attenborough explores the crucial role of sound in nature, examining how it shapes and influences the everyday lives of animals, from communication to their behaviour and decisions.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: From melodic songs to strange hums, David Attenborough sets out to discover the sounds that gibbons, lyrebirds, bull elk, and more use to find a mate and warn off the competition.

programme.title: Secret World of Sound with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough follows baby animals as they communicate in their quest for survival, using sound to beg and call for help in the vulnerable early days of life in the natural world.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David descends beneath the waves at night in the state of the art Triton submersible, the first of its kind to visit the reef. He meets some of the tiny coral animals that built the reef and helped to turn it into an underwater wonderland.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David continues his exploration of the Great Barrier Reef, aboard the research vessel the Alucia. He discovers the incredible animals that visit the reef every year, from birds to whales, some travelling thousands of kilometres to get there.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David examines what the next few decades hold for this remarkable community of animals, as well as what is being done to save it.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Right beneath our feet is a secret world of disguise and espionage, social networking and courtship, rape and pillage, parenthood and relationships. Sir David Attenborough investigates how macroscopic residents outwit their enemies to survive.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Its a bug-eating world out there, and the documentary continues with a look at how the various critters disable the defences of their respective prey.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Dating is just as tricky a business in the insect world, and Sir David Attenborough finds out how certain bugs choose and then woo their partners.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough reveals how different bugs usher in the next generation, including the butterfly and harvestman spider.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Join Sir David Attenborough as he zooms in on a set of bugs who prefer co-operation to conflict. Features the likes of the burrowing cockroach and the queen bee.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough takes a tour of the insect worlds vast colonies, which rival human megacities in terms of size and complexity.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The next stage of lemur introductions keeps the primate care staff on their toes, while gibbons Kim and Tien head back to their familiar stomping ground.

programme.title: Monkey Life

programme.title: Monkey Life

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Rise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates
programme.desc: David Attenborough uses fossil evidence and CGI to reveal how mammals developed from tiny forest dwellers to become the dominant life form on the planet.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: A Christmas feast awaits as Romesh, Jamie and Micah celebrate the season as only they can, with special guests over dinner and a spot of golf.

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Love Actually: Nine separate tales are woven together to create a cross-section of life, ranging from the zany to the uplifting to the heartbreaking.

programme.title: Caught On Dashcam: Christmas Special
programme.desc: Featuring the most jaw-dropping car crashes, near misses and road incidents ever caught on camera.

programme.title: Christmas at the Movies
programme.desc: Christmas time just would not be Christmas without movies, and Tom Hanks and a cast of other familiar faces are here to reveal their favourite festive flicks and seasonal specials.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Decades into the future, Lisa recounts the story of how Homer ended up being scapegoated for a power outage that plunged Springfield into darkness days before Thanksgiving.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley. (2024, 90 mins)

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: Gary Avis, Meaghan Grace Hinkis and Ricardo Cervera star in this stunning performance of Tchaikovskys magical ballet, recorded at the Royal Opera House in December 2012.

programme.title: Wicked: One Wonderful Night
programme.desc: Ariana Grande, Cynthia Erivo and the cast of Wicked: For Good headline an exclusive one-time concert event and share a personal look inside their experiences on the eve of the films anticipated finale.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: John Bishop: 25 Years Of Stand Up
programme.desc: Marking 25 years since he first stepped onto the comedy stage, comedian, TV presenter and actor John Bishop embarks on his tenth stand-up tour to celebrate his career.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...
programme.desc: Rob and Rom venture into the Sumatran jungle to see who can snap the most exhibition-worthy photo for Wildlife Photographer of the Year.

programme.title: Ricky Gervais Live 2: Politics
programme.desc: Specially edited film showing the entire performance of `Politics on Ricky Gervais sell-out UK tour, plus a candid look behind-the-scenes at Rickys antics on the road.

programme.desc: The gang are joined by ALOTO all-stars Tony Bellew, Dame Laura Kelly and Big Zuu for an action-packed Last Dance episode full of iconic games from the series.

programme.desc: The UK Border Agency is an uninvited guest at sham weddings in Birmingham and Glasgow, while a Brazilian man wanting to see his British husband is stopped at Heathrow where checks reveal a string of lies.

programme.title: UK Border Force
programme.desc: Documentary going behind the scenes of the UK Border Agency as undercover officers in Lagos, Nigeria, try to stop illegal immigrants boarding flights to Britain. Cameras also follow the work of those trying to expose one of the biggest visa scams in British history and passengers are confronted as they try to smuggle goods overseas.

programme.title: Customs UK
programme.desc: In Dover, a giant X-ray machine helps officers tackle industrial scale smugglers hoping to hide amongst the thousands of trucks flooding through the port each day.

programme.title: Customs UK
programme.desc: A ton of cannabis concealed in a truck is discovered at Dover and an intimate search gets to the bottom of a suspected heroin smuggler at Gatwick.

programme.desc: A runaway van causes gridlock when it careers down an embankment, police race to a multiple car crash near Newcastle, and there is a battle to deliver a luxury liner to the London Boat Show on time.

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: Action-packed series which looks at street crime during the festive season. Police are called to a kebab shop in Harrogate, where a female employee has been attacked by a customer, and in Colchester two women are arrested for possessing cocaine. Despite the introduction of pop-up urinals in the street, a Durham man urinates on the pavement and becomes abusive when police ask him to stop.

programme.title: Street Crime UK
programme.desc: Action-packed Christmas special looking at how the police respond to street crime. programme.title: Whats on TPTV with Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed for the last half December.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts are having no success ih getting acquainted with their neighbours. The clan is having trouble with Mrs Drysdale and others.

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: A dying rancher robs a bank to leave money for his family.

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Christmas Pudding
programme.desc: A prisoner escapes shortly after he receives Christmas pudding.

programme.title: Up in the World
programme.desc: A window cleaner on a country estate suffers the pranks of his employers son, only to get the blame when there is an attempt to kidnap the aristocratic young upstart.

programme.title: Christmas Carols from Cambridge
programme.desc: Directed by Peter Morley. The choir of Kings College Cambridge sing famous carols, and the lessons that tell the story of the birth of Jesus are read by the great Sir John Gielgud.

programme.title: The Stories Behind the Songs
programme.desc: Join Kate Garner for the fun and frolics of `I Do Like To Be Beside The Seaside and a tale of both triumph and tragedy for the woman who wrote the lyrics to Keep The Home Fires Burning.

programme.title: The Christmas Tree
programme.desc: Gary determines to get a tree for children who will be in hospital for Christmas.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Robin Hood and Friar Tuck join forces to save a boys goose and teach Sir Leon a lesson about Christmas spirit.

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Stars Patrick OConnell, Jean Anderson and Jeffry Wickham. The honeymoon is over, and it is business as usual. Mary confides in Jennifer, and Bill and Gwen digest their loss.

programme.title: David Nixons Christmas Magic
programme.desc: The magician and entertainer David Nixon is joined by some wonderful guests like Lynsey de Paul and Robert Harbin for a festive celebration of magic, comedy and music!

programme.title: North West Frontier
programme.desc: In 1905, a rebellion on Indias north west frontier threatens the life of a young Hindu prince. programme.title: Victorian Farm Christmas
programme.desc: Ruth Goodman, Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn return to the Acton Scott estate in Shropshire to celebrate a traditional Christmas. Theres farm work to be done before the festive season, including the hay harvest. Peter travels to the Royal Agricultural Societys annual show with sheep expert Richard Spencer to choose a new ram; back at the farm, Ruth makes mincemeat for the Christmas mince pies.

programme.title: Victorian Farm Christmas
programme.desc: The team tackle the restoration of the blacksmiths forge, which involves a full five days and nights making bricks. As Christmas nears, they must source a Yule log, and Ruth winter-proofs the cottage, making a paper blanket and remedies for chilblains, rheumatism, coughs and colds. Also, Ruth enlists the help of the worlds only Christmas cracker historian, Peter Kimpton.

programme.title: Victorian Farm Christmas
programme.desc: Christmas is coming to Acton Scott, but first theres a huge amount of preparation to do. Ruth Goodman and food historian Ivan Day try their hand at making a Christmas pudding using the same methods as Bob Cratchits wife in `A Christmas Carol. Meanwhile, Alex and Peter light the forge for the first time to re-shoe the farm workhorse Clumper.

programme.sub-title: Action Man at the Speed of Sound

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Stacey and Gavin return from honeymoon to a big welcome from both families. However, Smithy seems none too happy with his best mate and Nessa has a confession to make that throws the whole evening into disarray.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Devastated by the news hes to become a father, Smithy goes AWOL. The boys finally track him down, but can he be persuaded to do the right thing? Stacey is shocked to hear of Gwens new domestic arrangements as the prospect of living in Essex finally hits her.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Stacey is getting used to being an Essex wife, but its not as exciting as shed hoped, however, she bucks up at the weekend, when its time for a home visit to Barry. Meanwhile, Smithy goes with Nessa for the first scan and they get the first glimpse of their baby.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Mick becomes a minor celebrity for the night, Stacey and Gavin start house-hunting, and Nessa visits Stacey and shows the others a thing or two at the bowling alley.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Its Gwens birthday and Bryn has arranged a special treat, but things take a surprising turn when an uninvited guest turns up and Stacey tells Gavin of her big decision.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Gavin is in Essex without his wife. Stacey is in Barry without her husband. So while Smithy plans a boys night out, Stacey goes to the bingo, but has living separate lives finally taken its toll on loves young dream?

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Stacey returns to Essex to sort out the situation with Gavin, but things are not looking good. Meanwhile in Barry, an unexpected event throws everyone into a panic.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Racing
programme.desc: The racing series that Isaac Newton would surely approve of: no engines, just gravity! Rival amateur teams descend on Mumbai to race their homemade soapboxes downhill.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: In this special Christmas episode, Freddie, Chris and Paddy play car secret Santa for a festive road trip across Britain, transporting a giant Christmas tree as they head to Top Gears very own winter wonderland.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Nessa and the Wests head east, with some help from Dave and his coach. Meanwhile in Essex, Dawn and Pete visit for drinks, Mick is preoccupied with his new love, and Smithy cannot wait to spend his first Christmas with Neil the Baby. Pam has prepared a lovely spread and Bryn has his mistletoe ready, but as the Christmas spirit gets a grip, Gavin and Stacey have a startling announcement to make.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Gavin starts his new job in Cardiff and Stacey is thrilled to be at home again. Smithy comes to terms with life in Essex without his best mate, whilst Nessa is adjusting to life in Daves caravan down Sully. The weekend brings with it a big reunion, as everyone meets up for the christening of Neil the baby, but how will Smithy react to news from Nessa that it is a double celebration?

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Stacey is trying for a new job whilst ensuring that Gavin sticks to his recent promise, and Dave is not a happy bunny when Nessa tells him she is taking Neil the baby to Essex to see his dad. Meanwhile, over at the Shipmans house, Dawn and Pete have joined Pam and Mick for a beer and curry night of huge proportions - at the Billericay house of fun.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Pam and Mick are having second thoughts about the conservatory, whilst Bryn is in his element as he awaits the arrival of his houseguests - all the Essex boys down for a big night out in Cardiff - and having a sleep over at his! Elsewhere, Smithy gets in a state about seeing Nessa after their most recent embarrassing meeting, and Stacey makes a worrying discovery, but is telling Gavin the right thing to do?

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Gavin is uncomfortable with Gwen and Bryn knowing the ins and outs of his and Staceys sex life, and Smithy goes beyond the call of friendship by making a staggering suggestion. Meanwhile, Pete and Dawn prepare to renew their wedding vows, and everyone heads to Billericay to help them celebrate. But how will Dave react to the bombshell revelation about the curry night in Essex?

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: It is Bank Holiday Monday, and the Essex contingent arrives for a sunny day out at the beach; even Doris gets her sun dress on. Gavins heart-to-heart with his dad gives him something more to think about, and a dark cloud looms on the horizon when Dave arrives to find Nessa and Smithy enjoying all the fun of the fair.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Nessa and Daves wedding is fast approaching, and the preparations are in full swing. Stacey breaks some life-changing news to Gavin, while Bryn and Jason finally put their big secret to bed. Smithy takes care of Neil the baby, and wishes Nessa all the best as she makes her way to the church to marry Dave.

Finding that Hobbo has moved next door, Clegg and Truly recall that he was never much of a milkman.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Hitler turns his tanks towards Russia. After a succession of devastating victories, the Germans delay fatally, and the fierce Russian winter takes a grip.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: The Japanese, at war on the Chinese mainland since 1931, hope for quick victories over the British and the Dutch, but 7 December 1941 brings the infamous attack on Pearl Harbor, and the start of an all-conquering sweep through Southeast Asia culminating in the taking of Singapore.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The antiques programme pays a return visit to Castle Coole near Enniskillen in Northern Ireland. Fiona Bruce and the team of experts welcome visitors as they bring their family treasures for inspection. Pieces featured include a poignant reminder from the battlefields of World War One, a beautiful and valuable modern painting of an Irish landscape, and a collection of compacts with a jaw-dropping valuation.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts return to the exciting backdrop of the Farnborough wind tunnels for another busy day of evaluations. programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A delightful collection of British classics comes up for auction, including an Austin A35 and a Hillman Avenger Estate in stunning condition. An E-Type Jaguar also hits the auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Three MGs from the 70s turn up at the garage, still covered in original factory wax. Nobody can believe it, or value them. A Morris 1000 turns up at the auction along with a TR7 V8.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: This edition looks at deserts, which cover a third of the Earths land surface. From space they appear lifeless but a closer look reveals a different picture, from Mongolias Gobi desert where wild Bactrian camels have to eat snow in lieu of water, to the Atacama in Chile where guanacos survive by licking the dew off cactus spines.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although the frozen worlds of the Arctic and Antarctic experience the greatest seasonal extremes, it is the advance and retreat of the ice that is the real challenge to life. As the sea freezes, Antarctica doubles in size and all animals except for the Emperor Penguin flee. In the Arctic, the polar bears ice world literally melts beneath its feet, forcing it to swim vast distances.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Colonel Von Strohm and Captain Geering are first kidnapped by the Communist Resistance, then rescued by a Gaullist group, recovering a valuable painting in the process. But whats so special about this particular Madonna?

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: America entered conflict after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, but the conflict in Europe and the conflict in the Pacific were two separate wars. Many Americans would have been content to forget about Hitler and Europe. Despite opposition from congress President Roosevelt, however, was committed to fighting Hitler. Eventually Hitler declared war on America, thus relieving Roosevelt of a difficult decision.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: The North Africa campaign, Montys Desert Rats against Rommels Korps, was about heat, thirst, flies, sandstorms and 600 miles of sand. The combatants speak.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head for the races as they arrive at Chepstow Racecourse in Wales. Family treasures featured include medals from early Olympic Games, awarded when tug-of-war was a competing sport; a light bulb containing a painstakingly-made model of Lincoln Cathedral gifted by a German prisoner of war in World War 2; and perhaps the oddest and one of the oldest pieces of glass ever featured on the programme.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A second visit for Fiona Bruce and the experts at Stowe School in Buckinghamshire brings thousands of visitors eager to discover more about their heirlooms. programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the worlds great plains - immense wilderness areas that seem empty, but which support the greatest gatherings of wildlife on earth, including two million gazelles on the Mongolian steppes, and three million caribou in North America. At the heart of all this is single living thing - grass - able to survive the baking savannahs of Africa, the frozen tundra of the Arctic, and the Indian floodplains.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals the greatest woodlands on earth, from the evergreen forests of the frozen north to the deciduous dry forests of the equator. The Taiga forest is a silent world of stunted conifers cloaked in snow and ice. By contrast, the broadleaf forests of North America and Europe bustle with life, while the baobab forests of Madagascar are the strangest of all, with bizarre upside-down trees.

programme.desc: The historic Jaguar factory in the Midlands opens its doors to show us exactly how the new F-TYPE is built from scratch. From its sleek chassis to an engine that can reach top speeds of 177mph, we follow one F-TYPE on its journey through the factory.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to North Yorkshire to pick up a veteran London-to-Brighton car, theres an emotional farewell to a 1980s Bedford HA van, and a Toyota Corona finds a new home.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek gives the once-over to a Royale Formula Ford race car, and Paul is on a marathon trip to Teesside to pick up a 1953 MGYB, a Moggy Van and an 80s Yamaha 250RD motorbike.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Hitler turns his tanks towards Russia. After a succession of devastating victories, the Germans delay fatally, and the fierce Russian winter takes a grip.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: The Japanese, at war on the Chinese mainland since 1931, hope for quick victories over the British and the Dutch, but 7 December 1941 brings the infamous attack on Pearl Harbor, and the start of an all-conquering sweep through Southeast Asia culminating in the taking of Singapore.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The antiques programme pays a return visit to Castle Coole near Enniskillen in Northern Ireland. Fiona Bruce and the team of experts welcome visitors as they bring their family treasures for inspection. Pieces featured include a poignant reminder from the battlefields of World War One, a beautiful and valuable modern painting of an Irish landscape, and a collection of compacts with a jaw-dropping valuation.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts return to the exciting backdrop of the Farnborough wind tunnels for another busy day of evaluations. There is a diverse collection of objects brought before the cameras, including a mammoths tooth dug up in a garden and the Monopoly board game used by the Great Train Robbers whilst in hiding.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A delightful collection of British classics comes up for auction, including an Austin A35 and a Hillman Avenger Estate in stunning condition. An E-Type Jaguar also hits the auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Three MGs from the 70s turn up at the garage, still covered in original factory wax. Nobody can believe it, or value them. A Morris 1000 turns up at the auction along with a TR7 V8.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: This edition looks at deserts, which cover a third of the Earths land surface. From space they appear lifeless but a closer look reveals a different picture, from Mongolias Gobi desert where wild Bactrian camels have to eat snow in lieu of water, to the Atacama in Chile where guanacos survive by licking the dew off cactus spines.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although the frozen worlds of the Arctic and Antarctic experience the greatest seasonal extremes, it is the advance and retreat of the ice that is the real challenge to life. As the sea freezes, Antarctica doubles in size and all animals except for the Emperor Penguin flee. In the Arctic, the polar bears ice world literally melts beneath its feet, forcing it to swim vast distances.

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Colonel Von Strohm and Captain Geering are first kidnapped by the Communist Resistance, then rescued by a Gaullist group, recovering a valuable painting in the process. But whats so special about this particular Madonna?

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.sub-title: The Dance of the Hitler Youth
programme.desc: The Germans celebrate the burning of the Reichstag, by having the young girls of Nouvion dress as Hitler Youth and perform Bavarian dances.

programme.title: Mega Metro
programme.desc: A challenge lies in weight when the time comes to dig two tunnels beneath Sydney Harbour, with an insight into the teams planning process.

programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.desc: A visit behind the scenes with the small team in Dartford who hand-build the iconic open-top two-seater Caterham 7 sports car. See exactly how the Caterham 7 is built up from raw materials like aluminium and fibreglass.

programme.title: How To Build A Motor Car
programme.desc: A look at how Liverpool supercar manufacturer Briggs Automotive Company make their £270k BAC Mono R: the worlds first single-seat, road-legal supercar. With only 40 of the vehicles ever to be made in the world, this is precision engineering.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is on the road to pick up a funky little Nissan Figaro and a sublime Ferrari 250 GT tribute car, and Paul gets to try out his spanking new Scania T Cab.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: America entered conflict after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, but the conflict in Europe and the conflict in the Pacific were two separate wars. Many Americans would have been content to forget about Hitler and Europe. Despite opposition from congress President Roosevelt, however, was committed to fighting Hitler. Eventually Hitler declared war on America, thus relieving Roosevelt of a difficult decision.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: The North Africa campaign, Montys Desert Rats against Rommels Korps, was about heat, thirst, flies, sandstorms and 600 miles of sand. The combatants speak.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team head for the races as they arrive at Chepstow Racecourse in Wales. Family treasures featured include medals from early Olympic Games, awarded when tug-of-war was a competing sport; a light bulb containing a painstakingly-made model of Lincoln Cathedral gifted by a German prisoner of war in World War 2; and perhaps the oddest and one of the oldest pieces of glass ever featured on the programme.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A second visit for Fiona Bruce and the experts at Stowe School in Buckinghamshire brings thousands of visitors eager to discover more about their heirlooms. Featured on the programme are an MBE awarded to the surgeon who operated on George VI at Buckingham Palace and bestowed by the king in his dressing gown, and a single plate from `the finest porcelain dinner service ever made.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Three rare Alvises get the auction buyers going when put under the hammer. A Chevy Corvette which started its journey in Saudi Arabia makes its way to Thornton le Dale for the sale.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave gets a nasty surprise when he opens the bonnet of a fast Ford from the 80s, and an Austin Heavy 12 nearly a century old sets off a bidding war at the auction.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the worlds great plains - immense wilderness areas that seem empty, but which support the greatest gatherings of wildlife on earth, including two million gazelles on the Mongolian steppes, and three million caribou in North America. At the heart of all this is single living thing - grass - able to survive the baking savannahs of Africa, the frozen tundra of the Arctic, and the Indian floodplains.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals the greatest woodlands on earth, from the evergreen forests of the frozen north to the deciduous dry forests of the equator. The Taiga forest is a silent world of stunted conifers cloaked in snow and ice. By contrast, the broadleaf forests of North America and Europe bustle with life, while the baobab forests of Madagascar are the strangest of all, with bizarre upside-down trees.
